SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
Ambient light class represents the ambient light in the scene.
Camera
The Camera class represents a virtual camera in a 3D scene.
Camera.Builder
Builder class to construct a Camera object with specific parameters.
CameraIntersectionsIntegrationTests
Integration tests: verifying ray intersections with geometric shapes constructed from the camera
CameraTest
Testing Camera Class
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Cylinder
Cylinder class represents a cylinder in 3D space.
CylinderTest
Unit tests for Cylinder class
Double3
This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
Geometries
Unit tests for Cylinder class.
GeometriesTest
A list of geometries in the scene.
Geometry
An abstract class representing a geometric object in 3D space.
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriterTest
Unit tests for the ImageWriter class.
Intersectable
A list of geometries in the scene.
Main
Main class for running the initial tests for the geometric shapes and operations.
Plane
Represents a plane in 3D space defined by a point and a normal vector.
PlaneTest
Unit tests for Plane class.
Point
Represents a point in a 3D space using Double3.
PointTest
Unit test for primitives.Point class
Polygon
Polygon class represents a two-dimensional convex polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
PolygonTest
Unit tests for Polygon class.
RadialGeometry
An abstract class that represents geometries with a radial dimension, such as spheres, cylinders, etc.
Ray
Ray class represents a ray in 3D space.
RayTest
Unit tests for the Ray class.
RayTracerBase
Abstract base class for ray tracing.
RayTracerType
Ray tracer types
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
The Scene class represents a 3D scene containing background color, ambient light, and a collection of geometries.
SceneBuilderXML
A builder class for constructing a Scene and related objects from an XML file.
SimpleRayTracer
SimpleRayTracer is a concrete implementation of the RayTracerBase class.
Sphere
Represents a sphere geometry, which is a type of radial geometry defined by a center point and a radius.
SphereTest
Default constructor for PolygonTest.
Triangle
Represents a triangle geometry, which is a type of polygon defined by three points.
TriangleTest
Unit tests for Triangle class.
Tube
Represents a tube geometry, which is a type of radial geometry defined by an axis (a Ray) and a radius.
TubeTest
Tolerance for floating-point comparisons.
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
Represents a three-dimensional vector in 3D space A vector extends Point but cannot be the zero vector (0,0,0).
VectorTest
Unit tests for Vector class.
